meaningMnemonic: If you have <radical>spider</radical>s in your <radical>mouth</radical>, then you're going to <kanji>instigate</kanji> fights between people. Mostly because the spider in your mouth makes you grumpy, but also because the spider keeps telling you to be an instigator with its little mouth inside your own mouth.
readingMnemonic: The spider in your mouth tells you to <kanji>instigate</kanji> a fight by <reading>saw</reading>ing (さ) the other person's leg off. It even whispers where you can find a nice big saw.
